page.title: 18PARKS
page.content: {HYLAND PARK}is a public park. It is open from sunrise to sunset. It has its own football pitch, cricket pitch, 4 tennis courts, a pavilion and toilets. It has three entrances. There are many different trees all the way round. It has swings and slides. Lots of children play there. People walk their dogs there. It is a good place for watching birds and for getting away from traffic. We saw greenfinches, wood pigeon, a hooded crow, mistle thrush, dunnock, house sparrow, starling, blackbird and a lapwing. {HARROW LODGE PARK}has a boating lake, playground, criket pavilion, tennis courts, swimming pool and an old manor house called Harrow Lodge. There are four entrances. We saw ducks, swans, dogs and cats. There was a little playground with swings.
